solution.text:
Let us consider \(\sqrt5 \times 2 = 2 \sqrt5\).
\(\sqrt5\) is non-terminating non-recurring.
Multiplying \(2\) and \(\sqrt5\) will also give us a non-terminating non-recurring number which is irrational.

content.text: The product or quotient of a non-zero rational number and an irrational number is rational.
